about.all:
## About Live Stream Recorder

Never miss a moment from your favorite creators. Our cloud-based platform lets you capture live streams automatically so you can watch them on your own schedule.

### Automatic Livestream Recording

Simply follow the creators you love, and our cloud servers handle the rest. Stream recording happens automatically in the background — no software to install, no manual scheduling. Just follow a creator and their live streams are captured for your personal use.

### Watch Anytime, Anywhere

Busy schedule? Different time zone? No problem. With cloud-based recording of streaming video, you can catch up on live content whenever it suits you. Access your recordings through our built-in player or download them for offline viewing.

### Securely Stored in the Cloud

Your recorded streams are saved securely on our servers. No storage fees, no lost files — just reliable access to your favorite content whenever you need it. Capture video streams from multiple platforms, all organized and ready to watch.

### Record TikTok, Twitch, YouTube, Kick & More

Whether you want to record TikTok live streams, record Twitch streams, capture YouTube lives, or save Kick broadcasts — our cloud-based service has you covered. Support for more platforms is continuously being added.

### No Screen Recorder Needed

Unlike a live stream screen recorder that requires your computer to stay on, our cloud service runs 24/7. No need for livestream screen recorder software or leaving your PC running. Streams are recorded even while you sleep.

### Free to Get Started

Create an account and start recording your favorite streamers today. Upgrade to premium for higher quality recordings, more simultaneous follows, and faster downloads.
about.tiktok:
## About TikTok Live Stream Recording

Never miss a TikTok Live again. Our cloud-based platform automatically captures TikTok live streams from your favorite creators so you can watch them on your own schedule.

### Why Record TikTok Lives?

TikTok Live is packed with exclusive content — from trending challenges to candid moments with your favorite creators. Live streams on TikTok are ephemeral, and once they end, they are gone forever. With our service, you will never miss a moment.

### Automatic TikTok Live Recording

Simply follow the TikTok creators you love, and our cloud servers handle the rest. TikTok Live recording happens automatically in the background — no software to install, no manual scheduling. Just follow a creator and their TikTok live streams are captured for your personal use.

### Watch TikTok Lives Anytime

Busy schedule? Different time zone? No problem. With cloud-based TikTok recording, you can catch up on live content whenever it suits you. Access your TikTok recordings through our built-in player or download them for offline viewing.

### TikTok Streams Securely Stored

Your recorded TikTok streams are saved securely on our servers. No storage fees, no lost files — just reliable access to your favorite TikTok content whenever you need it.

### No Screen Recorder Needed

Unlike a TikTok screen recorder that requires your phone or computer to stay on, our cloud service runs 24/7. No need for screen recording software or leaving your device running. TikTok Lives are recorded even while you sleep.

### Free to Get Started

Create an account and start recording your favorite TikTok streamers today. Upgrade to premium for higher quality recordings, more simultaneous follows, and faster downloads.
about.twitch:
## About Twitch Stream Recording

Never miss a Twitch stream again. Our cloud-based platform automatically captures Twitch live streams from your favorite streamers so you can watch them on your own schedule.

### Why Record Twitch Streams?

Twitch is home to gaming, esports, and massive communities. Streams run for hours, and VODs expire or get deleted. With our service, save every moment from esports tournaments, speedrun sessions, or your favorite streamer's broadcast — forever.

### Automatic Twitch VOD Recording

Simply follow the Twitch streamers you love, and our cloud servers handle the rest. Twitch stream recording happens automatically in the background — no software to install, no manual scheduling. Just follow a streamer and their Twitch broadcasts are captured for your personal use.

### Watch Twitch Streams Anytime

Busy schedule? Different time zone? No problem. With cloud-based Twitch recording, you can catch up on live content whenever it suits you. Access your Twitch VODs through our built-in player or download them for offline viewing.

### Twitch Streams Securely Stored

Your recorded Twitch streams are saved securely on our servers. No storage fees, no lost files — just reliable access to your favorite Twitch content whenever you need it. Never worry about VODs expiring or being deleted.

### No Screen Recorder Needed

Unlike a Twitch screen recorder that requires your computer to stay on, our cloud service runs 24/7. No need for OBS or screen recording software. Twitch streams are recorded even while you sleep.

### Free to Get Started

Create an account and start recording your favorite Twitch streamers today. Upgrade to premium for higher quality recordings, more simultaneous follows, and faster downloads.
about.youtube:
## About YouTube Live Stream Recording

Never miss a YouTube Live again. Our cloud-based platform automatically captures live streams and premieres from your favorite YouTube channels.

### Why Record YouTube Lives?

YouTube Live brings everything together — from live concerts and sports events to Q&A sessions with creators and movie premieres. Some live streams are not saved or get deleted later. With our service, save every moment.

### Automatic YouTube Live Recording

Simply follow the YouTube channels you love, and our cloud servers handle the rest. YouTube Live recording happens automatically in the background — no software to install, no manual scheduling. Just follow a channel and their live streams are captured for your personal use.

### Watch YouTube Lives Anytime

Busy schedule? Different time zone? No problem. With cloud-based YouTube recording, you can catch up on concerts, sports events, or creator streams whenever it suits you.

### YouTube Streams Securely Stored

Your recorded YouTube streams are saved securely on our servers. No storage fees, no lost files — even if the creator deletes the original stream.

### No Screen Recorder Needed

Unlike a YouTube screen recorder that requires your computer to stay on, our cloud service runs 24/7. YouTube streams are recorded even while you sleep.

### Free to Get Started

Create an account and start recording your favorite YouTube channels today. Upgrade to premium for higher quality recordings, more simultaneous follows, and faster downloads.
about.kick:
## About Kick Stream Recording

Never miss a Kick stream again. Our cloud-based platform automatically captures Kick live streams from your favorite creators.

### Why Record Kick Streams?

Kick is the rising platform where big creators are migrating. With better revenue splits for streamers and fewer restrictions, Kick has become home to unique content you will not find anywhere else. Do not miss exclusive streams from Kick's biggest stars.

### Automatic Kick Recording

Simply follow the Kick streamers you love, and our cloud servers handle the rest. Kick stream recording happens automatically in the background — no software to install, no manual scheduling.

### Watch Kick Streams Anytime

Busy schedule? Different time zone? No problem. With cloud-based Kick recording, you can catch up on live content whenever it suits you. Access your Kick recordings through our built-in player or download them for offline viewing.

### Kick Streams Securely Stored

Your recorded Kick streams are saved securely on our servers. No storage fees, no lost files — just reliable access to your favorite Kick content whenever you need it.

### No Screen Recorder Needed

Unlike a screen recorder that requires your computer to stay on, our cloud service runs 24/7. Kick streams are recorded even while you sleep.

### Free to Get Started

Create an account and start recording your favorite Kick streamers today. Upgrade to premium for higher quality recordings, more simultaneous follows, and faster downloads.
about.pandalive:
## About PandaLive Stream Recording

Never miss a PandaLive stream again. Our cloud-based platform automatically captures PandaLive streams from your favorite creators.

### Why Record PandaLive Streams?

PandaLive is the popular Korean streaming platform, home to exclusive Korean content and Asian creators. If you are a fan of Korean content, PandaLive offers a unique experience you will not find on Western platforms.

### Automatic PandaLive Recording

Simply follow the PandaLive creators you love, and our cloud servers handle the rest. PandaLive recording happens automatically in the background — no software to install, no manual scheduling.

### Watch PandaLive Streams Anytime

Busy schedule? Big time difference with Korea? No problem. With cloud-based PandaLive recording, you can catch up on Korean content whenever it suits you.

### PandaLive Streams Securely Stored

Your recorded PandaLive streams are saved securely on our servers. No storage fees, no lost files.

### Free to Get Started

Create an account and start recording your favorite PandaLive streamers today.
about.afreecatv:
## About AfreecaTV Stream Recording

Never miss an AfreecaTV stream again. Our cloud-based platform automatically captures AfreecaTV streams from your favorite BJs.

### Why Record AfreecaTV Streams?

AfreecaTV is the original Korean streaming giant — the platform that birthed Korea's live streaming culture. From esports tournaments to mukbang shows, AfreecaTV delivers authentic Korean content you will not find anywhere else.

### Automatic AfreecaTV Recording

Simply follow the AfreecaTV BJs you love, and our cloud servers handle the rest. AfreecaTV recording happens automatically in the background — no software to install, no manual scheduling.

### Watch AfreecaTV Streams Anytime

Busy schedule? Big time difference with Korea? No problem. With cloud-based AfreecaTV recording, you can catch up on Korean content whenever it suits you.

### AfreecaTV Streams Securely Stored

Your recorded AfreecaTV streams are saved securely on our servers. No storage fees, no lost files.

### Free to Get Started

Create an account and start recording your favorite AfreecaTV BJs today.
